thread.title: Razor Technology Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
thread.title_full: Razor Technology Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Razor Technology Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
text:
List Recognizes Thriving Solution Providers in the IT Channel
Philadelphia, PA, (PRWEB) September 28, 2015
Razor Technology announced that it has been named to The Channel Company’s 2015 CRN® Fast Growth 150 list. Based on gross revenue over the two-year period from 2012 to 2014, The Fast Growth 150 list ranks solution providers based in North America with significant economic growth. In a turbulent IT economy, these companies have shown exceptional prowess in growing their operations and constantly providing essential services to their customers.
Razor Technology is a leader in providing Enterprise-class Cloud Solutions for Everyone, including cloud backup, recovery, security, and IaaS solutions for companies of all sizes. Burgeoning demand for IT infrastructure partners who offer customizable and complete cloud-based services as well as trusted technology expertise has led to Razor’s strong and continuous growth over the past several years.
“Our customers are looking for a solution provider that has their best interest at heart, from the first discussion to implementation and beyond, and we’re glad to be that company. From all of us at Razor Technology, we’re excited to be on The Channel Company’s 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 list, and we look forward to many more appearances in the future,” said Jim Stillittano, Managing Partner at Razor Technology.
“Cloud computing, mobile and big data technologies are making the industry both more exciting and more challenging than it’s ever been,” says Robert Faletra, CEO of The Channel Company. “Solution providers recognized in CRN’s Fast Growth 150 list are rising to meet the challenge and are thriving as a result. We are pleased to recognize these firms as leaders in today’s IT channel.”
The Fast Growth 150 list is highlighted in the October issue of CRN and can be viewed online at http://crn.com/fastgrowth .
